author: notnotstorm
content: hi. does anyone still have snapshots or nodes of ropsten or kovan? Im trying to assemble some public datasets of previous testnets. I tried tried syncing some nodes to these networks but it appears they are fully empty/deactivated at this point (rinkeby still has peers). any leads here would be much appreciated

author: yperbasis
content: You can try Erigon v2.31.0 or earlier. It might still have Ropsten snapshots on bittorrent.

author: notnotstorm
content: I did this yesterday for ropsten and it downloaded the torrents successfully. is there any way for erigon to replay the chain from just this torrent data without connecting to any peers/CL?
